name: Histacom
short_description:
A general computer user using Windows 95 in the year 1998 discovers a secret webpage that warns about hidden software on "12padams.com" (in-game website). Upon hacking into the website the user steals Time Distorter, a time travel program in alpha stages

With great curiosity the computer user installs this software onto their computer and attempts to activate it. 12padams, the software's developer telnets into the command prompt of the users computer warning them that he will destroy their computer and they can't escape. With the help of another character known as "The Hidden Hacker" the user successfully escapes 12padams and uses the software to jump forward into the future.

Upon arriving in 1999 things appear to have sorted themselves out. 12padams has hired you to be a guinea pig for his time travel software. Upon attempting to travel the the year 2000 however the y2K bug causes landing problems leading to a virus infested future which can only be saved with time travel.
summary: A time travel hacking game set in a real computer desktop environment
